name: Play - Week 11 Task - Video Game - Self Care
name_original: Play - Week 11 Task - Video Game - Self Care
description:
A message to myself in coloration with the course...

Everyone does online school for different reasons. Sometimes it can be challenging. 

As a gamer, a great visual outcome for this project is to make a fully functioning visual novel video game. 

Depending on the decisions you  make, you will get a different ending. The game shows you that it is okay to take breaks, but manifestation goes a long way. Always be positive, you can do this!
